review_blob: If you have never had a "sour" beer, then this is a great place to start. I wont bore you with details, but please do yourself a favor and give this a try.
An excellent German, American-Style IPA that has a beautiful appearance and bold character to match.

I really wanted to like this, and I dont hate it, so that is good. I feel it could be a bit more bold on the flavor front and have a bit more body. I like the amount of ginger it delivers, but it needs to be better balanced.
beer_name: Robinsons Old Tom With Ginger / Ginger  Tom (Bottle)

review_blob: Very nice IPA. Wonderful golden appearance, nicely hoppy with a nice finish that lingers.
